text:
For a course on the link communication and the language at work, I did a lot of research and I also concluded surveys and interviews. The goal of my research was to know if the communication in a company and the well-being have an impact on the productivity of employee. Indeed the communication and the language are very important for the weel-being of employees.
Before, at the time of my grandfather, the language et the discussion were completly fordiden. Now it's an important stake for the business. My studie shows me that, in new management, the communication in a company and the weel-being of employees have a huge influence on the productivity of the company.
The importance and the place of communication and of language in the work world evolve with the generations and with the technology's advancement.
 If I base my opinion on my personal experience, I think that the langugage is very important at the work. Indeed, the language allows firstly, a better communication is crucial for the transmissions of orders. But also, it's important to create links with colleagues and promotes a better working atmosphere and a better social climate. And I think that a better social climat has tis importznce in the mitovation, the involvement and so in the productivity of the employee. And who says efficient employee, says better production for the company and therefore happy company ! So everybody is happy !
